text: Israeli Educational Television (, ) was the first television channel in Israel. It was established in 1965 and began broadcasting in 1966. After it started broadcasting, it was added to the national broadcasting channels. Since 1997, it has had an independent broadcasting channel called Educational 23 on Channel 23. == Other websites == * Israeli Educational Television Category:Mass media in Israel Category:Television networks Category:1965 establishments in Israel Category:Education in Israel
title: Israeli Educational Television
